name: Hop’s Snorlax
author: OKACHEKE
flavor_text: This gluttonous Pokémon eats constantly, apart from when it’s asleep. It devours nearly 900 pounds of food per day.

abilities.name: Extra Helpings
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your Hop’s Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). The effect of Extra Helpings doesn’t stack.

attacks.name: Dynamic Press
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 80 damage to itself.
